parameters.name: VertexId
parameters.description: ID of the tessellation vertex for which you want to the parameters

title: ITessellation.IGetVertexParams
description: Gets the parameters corresponding to a tessellation vertex.

parameters.name: VertexId
parameters.description: ID of the tessellation vertex for which you want to the parameters

returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of contains 17 doubles (see Remarks ) VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
The following parameters returned from this method are formatted as an array of 17 doubles:
u, v - location of the vertex on the face (return value position [0-1])
du - tangent vector at u (return value [2-4])
dv - tangent vector at v (return value [5-7])
d2u, dudv, d2v - curvature vectors for u and v (return value [8-16])
